answers.answer: Did you injure this leg or foot recently or in the past?  When did the symptoms start (suddenly or gradually)?  Is it constant or on/off?  Would you say that is is numb?Looking down at your legs, is it on the outside of your leg and toes or on the inside of your leg and big toe and 2nd toe?Do your shoes fit properly or are they tight or worn?Do you have a history or diabetes, circulatory problems, heart problems, or any other medical problems?  What medications do you take?Sometimes you can get a neuropathy (problem with a nerve or nerves) either caused by injury or disease in most cases.  This is why I am asking you these questions.

question: I have a shooting or pitching like needle  pains under my left leg feet,what do you think is the course please.
title: feet problem
